name: ext-auth-jwt
description: Ed25519 + JWT (profiles pinned under arch/crypto). Deterministic token generation via canonical JSON payloads.
docs:
Ed25519 + JWT helpers pinned by arch/crypto contracts.

Modules:
- std.crypto.ed25519
- std.auth.jwt
- std.auth.jwt.tests

Worlds:
- run-os / run-os-sandboxed only

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-auth-jwt@0.1.1
- Use std.auth.jwt.sign_from_arch_v1 / verify_from_arch_v1 with profiles under arch/crypto.
